title: Is it time to call Lewis Hamilton the GOAT?
description: F1 journalist Lawrence Barretto joins the team to discuss Lewis Hamilton’s incredible career, his growth in 2020 and why he is such a compelling character.
itunes:title: Is it time to call Lewis Hamilton the GOAT?
itunes:author: ESPN, Alexis Nunes, Laurence Edmondson, Nate Saunders
itunes:subtitle: F1 journalist Lawrence Barretto joins the team to discuss Lewis Hamilton’s incredible career, his growth in 2020 and why he is such a compelling character.
